params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of the resource to update. Example: apps/myapp/services/default.

params.name: data.service
params.description: A Service resource containing the updated service. Only fields set in the field mask will be updated.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. Standard field mask for the set of fields to be updated.

params.name: data.migrate_traffic
params.description: Set to true to gradually shift traffic to one or more versions that you specify. By default, traffic is shifted immediately. For gradual traffic migration, the target versions must be located within instances that are configured for both warmup requests and automatic scaling. You must specify the shardBy field in the Service resource. Gradual traffic migration is not supported in the App Engine flexible environment. For examples, see Migrating and Splitting Traffic.

methods.name: getMigrateTraffic
methods.description:
Set to true to gradually shift traffic to one or more versions that you specify. By default, traffic is shifted immediately.

For gradual traffic migration, the target versions must be located within instances that are configured for both warmup requests and automatic scaling. You must specify the shardBy field in the Service resource. Gradual traffic migration is not supported in the App Engine flexible environment. For examples, see Migrating and Splitting Traffic.

Generated from protobuf field bool migrate_traffic = 4;
